name: eslint-config-portsoc
description: University of Portsmouth, School of Computing, ECMAScript Code Conventions

scripts.preversion: [ `git branch --show-current` = 'master' ] # current branch must be master
scripts.test: eslint -c index.js index.js tests/test.js && qunit tests/test.js

author: PortSoC <softeng@port.ac.uk>
